content.about:
## Hi, I am Danielle Petree, nice to meet you! ##
Petree Prints was founded by Danielle Petree, who decided to take a leap of faith and pursued one of her passions, large format printing. Petree Prints was created as a need for a large format fine art photography printing in Gainesville, Florida. Petree Prints is a family run business and is dedicated to providing its clients with affordable, quality prints.
## Business Contact ##
Phone: (352)-316-0879
Email: petreeprinting@gmail.com
Address: 10251 Ne 120th Ave. Archer FL, 32618
content.faq:
## What materials do you offer? ##
We offer the following list of materials: Matte, Gloss, etc.
## How large can my order be? ##
At the moment the largest possible size is: Xx by Xx
## Can I pay with something other than PayPal? ##
No, as of now we only accept payments through PayPal.
## How long will my order take? ##
Smaller sized orders are estimated to take 24-48 hours. Bigger sized orders are estimated to take 3-5 business days.
